Function: Alarms in case of smoke in nacelle
Failure \nEffects\n(Local, WEC, System): Failure to alarm with smoke present
Failure\nCause(s):
1) Sensor defect, contamination, or corrosion
2) wiring fault
Post Failure\nDetection:
1) SCADA - Loss of other systems, temperature increase
2) Visual - camera inspection
Post Failure\nRepair\nStrategy \n(automa:
1) Repair in-situ if possible. 
2) dry dock

Function: Alarms in case of smoke in nacelle
Failure \nEffects\n(Local, WEC, System): Alarm sounds with no smoke present
Failure\nCause(s):
1) Sensor defect, contamination, or corrosion
2) wiring fault
Post Failure\nDetection:
1) SCADA - All systems & temp are normal
2) Visual - camera inspection
Post Failure\nRepair\nStrategy \n(automa:
1) Do nothing
2) Repair in-situ if possible.

Function: Monitor for water intrusion and alarm if water present
Failure \nEffects\n(Local, WEC, System): Failure to alarm with water present
Failure\nCause(s):
1) Sensor defect, contamination, or corrosion
2) wiring fault
Post Failure\nDetection:
1) SCADA - Loss of other systems, humidity increase
2) Visual - camera inspection
Post Failure\nRepair\nStrategy \n(automa:
1) Repair in-situ if possible. 
2) dry dock

Function: Monitor access sensors and alarm based on SCADA operational setting.  Indicate hatch status
Failure\nMode: Failed CLOSED, hatch sensor fails to identify open access panel
Failure \nEffects\n(Local, WEC, System): Failure to alarm when access panel is opened
Failure\nCause(s):
1) Sensor defect, contamination, or corrosion
2) wiring fault
Post Failure\nDetection:
1) SCADA - water intrusion, humidity, temperature
2) Visual - camera inspection
Post Failure\nRepair\nStrategy \n(automa:
1) Repair in-situ if possible. 
2) dry dock
